'''Agnidus Agate''' are gemstones of varying quality used in the [[Characters#Ascensions|ascension]] of [[character]]s.

Agnidus Agate is associated with the [[Pyro]] element.

{{Material Quality

==Full Description==
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."<br />
"Burnt to cinders for a dream."<br />
"If the intention yet remains, achieved {{Obf|--}}'s truth he has."

==Trivia==
*The item descriptions are narrated by [[Murata]].
===Etymology===
*The English name for this item derives "Agnidus" from {{w|Agni}}, the Vedic deity of fire and the guardian of the southwest.
*In the Chinese version, "Agnidus" is instead {{Lang|mini=1|zh=燃愿|zh_rm=Rányuàn|zh_tl=Burning Wish; Raising [One's] Hope}}.
